title: Shinanaide! Asukawa-san
original_name: 死なないで！明日川さん
sinopse:
Youth is so embarrassing that she wants to die! An elegy of a completely "self-conscious" person. Being too focused on what other people think of her... will Asukawa be able to peacefully live her high school life?!

(Source: Kodansha, translated)
